content: Courses: Software Engineering, Web Progamming, Database Systems, Internet Of Things, Computer Networks, Cybersecurity, Machine Learning, Artifcial Intelligence, Cloud Computing
Courses: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Computer Science

experiences.company: Bangkit Academy (Google, GoTo, Traveloka) / PT Dicoding Indonesia
description: Developed the BudgetIn capstone project, a financial logging app that provides healthy financial recommendations based on user spending data.
Implemented the core recommendation engine using the XGBoost model to analyze past two months or more of user expenditures.
Deployed the ML model as an API service using Flask and successfully hosted the application on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Practiced cross-functional team collaboration with Mobile Development and Cloud Computing cohorts for full-stack system integration.
Developed a Hospital Management Information System (SIMRS) using CodeIgniter 3, focusing on critical Accounting and HRD modules.
Implemented core financial features including general ledgers, cash & bank management, receivables/payables, and automated financial reporting.
Conducted onsite system installation and configuration at Aceh hospitals, including NAS Synology servers, Fingerspot Revo devices, and administration PCs.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless system integration and maintain server stability.
Designed and developed an internship student data website from scratch using Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Managed deployment to hosting, performed SEO optimization, and conducted thorough functionality testing.
Created comprehensive technical documentation and provided ongoing maintenance and debugging support.

experiences.company: Infinite Learning / PT Kinema Systrans Multimedia
description: Applied Full-Stack Web Development concepts utilizing React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL.
Developed web applications with responsive interfaces and modern UI/UX design, based on prototypes previously created in Figma.
Practiced Agile/Scrum methodologies and leveraged GitHub for collaborative group project development.
